1.name: Chevaux de Frise
1.text: At the start of your opponent's battle phase, you may select a friendly creature. It gains +1 / +0 and "cannot counterattack" until end of turn.

2.name: Chevaux de Frise
2.text: At the start of your opponent's battle phase, you may select a friendly creature. It gains +1 / +1 and "cannot counterattack" until end of turn.
